title: Art of age
creator_credit: David E. Barrow, Stanley Hawes and New South Wales Film Corporation
brief_description: Four elderly people reflect on the possibilities of maintaining a fulfilling and productive life into old age. They all tell of there involvement with community groups and of the way they teach others their talents.
creator_credit_for_label: David E. Barrow, Stanley Hawes and New South Wales Film Corporation
